metadata.title: CVE-2021-22256 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Improper authorization in GitLab CE/EE affecting all versions since 12.6allowed guest users to create issues for Sentry errors and track theirstatus

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
